contentrichtext.text: '''Verendrye''' may refer to: *[[Pierre Gaultier de Varennes, sieur de La Vérendrye]] (1685–1749), French military officer, fur trader and explorer. His sons were: **[[Jean Baptiste de La Vérendrye]] (1713–1736), explorer **[[Pierre Gaultier de La Vérendrye]] (1714–1755), explorer and fur trader **[[François de La Vérendrye]] (1715–1794), explorer and trader **[[Louis-Joseph Gaultier de La Vérendrye]] (1717–1761), explorer and fur trader *[[La Vérendrye Wildlife Reserve]], a park in Quebec, Canada *[[La Verendrye Provincial Park]], Northwest Ontario, Canada *[[Verendrye Electric Cooperative]], a public utility cooperative in North Dakota *[[Verendrye, North Dakota]], a ghost town in North Dakota *[[Verendrye National Monument]], a former US national monument in North Dakota {{disambiguation}}
